Max.Action: Expresses fear of getting sick and desire to go to Elysium to avoid illness, showing vulnerability and hope.
Returns to scrubbing without complaint, indicating acceptance of his current situation.
Goes back to scrubbing after observing the medical bay and the advanced health technology.
Asks a relevant question about whether the people on Elysium get sick, showing curiosity and awareness.
Expresses a desire to go to Elysium to avoid sickness, indicating hope but no direct action or skill demonstrated.
Expresses that the deportation and treatment of repatriated humans is unfair.
Determined to improve his life despite harsh circumstances, listens to others about becoming a dealer.
Expresses determination to become rich despite harsh circumstances.
Plans to become a dealer based on advice from Pedro, showing limited critical judgment.
Slaps children's hands away when they try to go through his pockets, shakes a child upside down to get coins, then mocks the children and tells them to 'fuck off'.
Confronts gangsters confidently, reminding Carlo of owed bail money, showing assertiveness and street smarts.
Slaps children's hands away and physically shakes a child to get coins, using intimidation effectively to get what he wants.
Engages in banter with children, using humor and quick thinking to defuse the situation and maintain control.
Continues walking past a large starving crowd and a hovering food program vehicle without engaging or attempting to help or intervene.
Smiles cheerily and greets robotic police officers despite their hostile approach.
Resists police officers trying to grab his bag, tries to explain calmly he is just on his way to work.
Does not retaliate or escalate when beaten and restrained by police officers, tries to avoid trouble.

Resists the police officer grabbing his bag, attempts to assert his rights calmly.
Fails to avoid physical harm or de-escalate the situation with police droids, ends up beaten and restrained.
Struggles to look up at the Officers, head down, does not resist effectively, is subdued violently and injured.
Attempts to protest by saying 'That was my stop!' but is ignored and overpowered.
Gives a direct order to activate a reliable agent despite objections, showing decisiveness and confidence.
Presses for critical information about debris danger and weapon system status, demonstrating situational awareness and thoroughness.

Is injured and bleeding, indicating possible recent failure or vulnerability.
Attempts to explain or defend himself ('This isn’t my fault'), showing awareness and some assertiveness.
Keeps his mouth shut while being stitched up, showing patience and respect for Frey's instructions.
Smiles at Frey and tries to engage her before she leaves, indicating friendliness and a desire for connection.

Keeps his mouth shut while being stitched up, showing patience and self-control.

Walks towards the factory and follows safety protocol by grabbing a respirator mask.

Salutes the Foreman and shows deference, indicating professionalism.
Has been late multiple times this month, leading to a docking of pay and a warning.

Efficiently operates the assembly line, skillfully loading robotic heads, managing multiple tasks with focus and precision.
